originalText.text: It was my first visit and I was nervous. Everyone was so kind. They answered all my questions. Dr Gelfand also came out to speak with me. It was a gentle experience. The room was quiet and restful and the nurses were always there to check in... make sure all was well. If, like me, you're new to this and have concerns... I feel confident they will answer your questions and offer every comfort available.

originalText.text: The people at the center are outstanding. Excellent information provided in advance of my first visit, easy to schedule, and plenty of time to fully understand all aspects of treatment. My appointment took place on time and I never felt rushed. All questions were answered.

text.text: The people at the center are outstanding. Excellent information provided in advance of my first visit, easy to schedule, and plenty of time to fully understand all aspects of treatment. My appointment took place on time and I never felt rushed. All questions were answered.

originalText.text: I had an excellent patient experience at the American Infusion Center on York Ave in NYC. From the moment I walked in, I felt at ease as the receptionist greeted me, and the bedside manner of the nurses (Ann) and the doctor (Dr. Ghuman) was amazing. I was nervous given this was the first infusion I had ever had, but the whole team made it a great experience. I highly recommend them. :)

text.text: I had an excellent patient experience at the American Infusion Center on York Ave in NYC. From the moment I walked in, I felt at ease as the receptionist greeted me, and the bedside manner of the nurses (Ann) and the doctor (Dr. Ghuman) was amazing. I was nervous given this was the first infusion I had ever had, but the whole team made it a great experience. I highly recommend them. :)

originalText.text:
The Center I am treated at (York & 91st St) has a calm & professional feel. I noticed this the first time I entered the space about one year ago.

The staff is friendly, efficient & professional.  I am never left sitting and seemingly forgotten.  Plus when my appointment is over, I am not kept waiting to settle whatever co-pay or other obligation.
The physician I see is outstanding--very intelligent, friendly, completely informed about my current status as well as my history.
In summary, the Center is an excellent facility. It's treatment of patients (using myself as the example) is what I wish to experience at all other physicians' offices
& treatment centers.

originalText.text: American Infusion Center was kind. Thoughtful. Medically astute and delivered great care. The Dr there was particularly lovely she explained everything and listened well to questions
